item.description:
This will be a bike ride around the country lanes of the Quiet Corner, with a dip into the Natchaug Forest. Hybrid/Mountain bikes will probably be ideal. This is not hard-core cycling: you can walk your bike up the steep bits if you like. The loop I have in mind takes 1-1.5 hours. Bring water and a sense of humour. If it pours, we'll probably just hang around my place instead. I'll be providing drinks and nibbles when we return to base.
We'll start from my house and end there as well.
item.how_to_find_us: it's in the historic district of Chaplin center.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Bicycling in the Country, Followed by Refreshments @ Victoria's
